snippet.title: Another Code: Recollection – Overview Trailer – Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Uncover mysteries and visions of the past in this two-game collection, fully enhanced for the Nintendo Switch system.  

In the Another Code: Two Memories game, previously known as Trace Memory for the Nintendo DS system, Ashley journeys to the solitary Blood Edward Island after receiving a letter from the father she thought was deceased. In the sequel Another Code: R – Journey into Lost Memories, previously unreleased in North America, an older Ashley will meet new individuals and unravel the memories of her dearly departed mother. 

Another Code: Recollection, containing both games, launches January 19, 2024 only on Nintendo Switch. Pre-orders are available now on Nintendo eShop. A free demo is also available; you can transfer your progress over to the full game once purchased.  

#AnotherCodeRecollection #NintendoSwitch
